title: MetForm Entry Analysis
description: Schema for analyzing MetForm submissions using AI.

formId.description: Unique identifier for the submitted MetForm.

submittedFields.description: Key-value pairs of submitted form fields.

timestamp.description: Submission time of the form entry.

formDescription.description: Purpose of the form, used for contextual analysis.

analysis.description: AI-based review of the form submission.

entryValidity.description: Whether the entry complies with validation logic or business rules.

purposeAnalysis.description: AI's interpretation of the intent behind the form entry.

feedback.description: Suggestions, corrections, or notes based on entry content.

actions.description: Actions that should follow the analysis.

sendEmailNotification.description: Whether to notify someone via email.

redirectUrl.description: Optional URL to redirect the user to after submission.

displayMessage.description: Optional message shown to the user after submission.
